thought.text: Let me try to run some of the existing diff tests to make sure my fix doesn't break anything. Since I can't build the full astropy package, I'll try to run the tests in a way that doesn't require the full build:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpvq5i4eh4/astropy && python -c "
# Try to test the diff logic without importing the full astropy package
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '.')

# Test if we can at least import the diff module
try:
    import astropy.io.fits.diff as diff_module
    print('Successfully imported diff module')
except Exception as e:
    print(f'Could not import diff module: {e}')
    
# Test if we can import numpy and other basic dependencies
try:
    import numpy as np
    print('NumPy available')
except Exception as e:
    print(f'NumPy not available: {e}')
"
